files.README.md:
# Wildcard's Claude Code Plugin Marketplace

Official marketplace for Wildcard's Claude Code plugins.

## Available Plugins

### shell-ergonomics-skills

Shell ergonomics plugin with AI-powered statusline, session tracking, intelligent summaries, and developer experience improvements.

**Features:**
- ✅ AI-Powered Statusline with 3-line display
- ✅ Session Names auto-generated using Claude Haiku
- ✅ AI Summaries based on actual work
- ✅ Plan Tracking integrated with sessions
- ✅ Tool Usage Display (top 3 tools per session)
- ✅ Smart Caching with message-count invalidation
- ✅ Intelligent Cleanup (threshold-based, 100MB)

**Version:** 1.0.0
**License:** MIT
**Repository:** [wildcard/shell-ergonomics-skills](https://github.com/wildcard/shell-ergonomics-skills)

## Installation

### Step 1: Add the Marketplace

```bash
/plugin marketplace add wildcard/claude-marketplace
```

Or if you're using this from a different Git service:

```bash
/plugin marketplace add https://github.com/wildcard/claude-marketplace.git
```

### Step 2: Install Plugins

```bash
/plugin install shell-ergonomics-skills@wildcard
```

### Step 3: Configure Statusline (Optional)

For the shell-ergonomics-skills plugin, add to `~/.claude/settings.json`:

```json
{
  "statusLine": {
    "type": "command",
    "command": "bash ~/.claude/plugins/cache/shell-ergonomics-skills/skills/advanced-statusline/scripts/statusline-wrapper.sh"
  }
}
```

Then restart Claude Code.

## Requirements

For **shell-ergonomics-skills**:
- [Starship](https://starship.rs/) - `brew install starship`
- [jq](https://stedolan.github.io/jq/) - `brew install jq`
- Claude Code CLI

## Available Commands

After installation:

```bash
# List all installed plugins
/plugin list

# Update a plugin
/plugin update shell-ergonomics-skills@wildcard

# Remove a plugin
/plugin remove shell-ergonomics-skills@wildcard

# List available marketplaces
/plugin marketplace list
```

## Support

- **Issues:** [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/wildcard/shell-ergonomics-skills/issues)
- **Documentation:** [Plugin README](https://github.com/wildcard/shell-ergonomics-skills/blob/main/README.md)

## License

All plugins in this marketplace are licensed under MIT unless otherwise specified.
